languages.text: Однако около четырех веков назад станцию протаранило неизвестное космическое тело, и она рухнула на планету. Катастрофа не только погубила поселенцев, но и сделала этот мир непригодным для жизни на долгие века. Кратер, образовавшийся при падении станции, до сих пор виден с орбиты. Могила Сотто стала могилой для целого мира.

traits.locale_text: Однако около четырех веков назад станцию протаранило неизвестное космическое тело, и она рухнула на планету. Катастрофа не только погубила поселенцев, но и сделала этот мир непригодным для жизни на долгие века. Кратер, образовавшийся при падении станции, до сих пор виден с орбиты. Могила Сотто стала могилой для целого мира.

languages.text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.
languages.original_text: Однако около четырех веков назад станцию протаранило неизвестное космическое тело, и она рухнула на планету. Катастрофа не только погубила поселенцев, но и сделала этот мир непригодным для жизни на долгие века. Кратер, образовавшийся при падении станции, до сих пор виден с орбиты. Могила Сотто стала могилой для целого мира.

traits.locale_text: However, about four hundred years ago an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

However, about four hundred years ago an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

languages.text: 然而，大约四百年前，某个未知的天体撞上了空间站，将它直接砸到了行星上。这场灾难不仅导致所有居民当场毙命，还让这个世界在几百年间无法居住。空间站撞击形成的陨石坑，此刻仍然可以从轨道上观察到。索托之墓真的成为了整颗行星所有生命的坟墓。
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

traits.locale_text: 然而，大约四百年前，某个未知的天体撞上了空间站，将它直接砸到了行星上。这场灾难不仅导致所有居民当场毙命，还让这个世界在几百年间无法居住。空间站撞击形成的陨石坑，此刻仍然可以从轨道上观察到。索托之墓真的成为了整颗行星所有生命的坟墓。

languages.text: しかし約400年前、未知の宇宙体がステーションに衝突し、ステーションは惑星に崩れ落ちた。この大災害は入植者たちを死に至らしめただけでなく、惑星は何世紀にもわたって居住不能となった。ステーションの衝突によって形成されたクレーターは、今でも軌道上から観察することができる。ソットの墓は惑星全体の墓場となった。
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

traits.locale_text: しかし約400年前、未知の宇宙体がステーションに衝突し、ステーションは惑星に崩れ落ちた。この大災害は入植者たちを死に至らしめただけでなく、惑星は何世紀にもわたって居住不能となった。ステーションの衝突によって形成されたクレーターは、今でも軌道上から観察することができる。ソットの墓は惑星全体の墓場となった。

languages.text: Sin embargo, hace unos cuatrocientos años, un cuerpo cósmico desconocido chocó contra la estación, provocando su colapso sobre el planeta. La catástrofe no solo mató a los colonos, sino que dejó el mundo inhabitable durante siglos. El cráter formado por el impacto de la estación aún puede observarse desde la órbita. La Tumba de Sotto se convirtió en un sepulcro para todo el planeta.
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

traits.locale_text: Sin embargo, hace unos cuatrocientos años, un cuerpo cósmico desconocido chocó contra la estación, provocando su colapso sobre el planeta. La catástrofe no solo mató a los colonos, sino que dejó el mundo inhabitable durante siglos. El cráter formado por el impacto de la estación aún puede observarse desde la órbita. La Tumba de Sotto se convirtió en un sepulcro para todo el planeta.

languages.text: Vor etwa vierhundert Jahren jedoch rammte ein unbekannter Himmelskörper die Station, was dazu führte, dass sie auf den Planeten krachte. Die Katastrophe tötete nicht nur die Siedler, sondern machte auch die Welt über Jahrhunderte weg unbewohnbar. Die Krater vom Aufprall der Station sind aus dem Orbit noch immer zu sehen. Sottos Gruft ist zu einem Grab für den gesamten Planeten geworden.
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

traits.locale_text: Vor etwa vierhundert Jahren jedoch rammte ein unbekannter Himmelskörper die Station, was dazu führte, dass sie auf den Planeten krachte. Die Katastrophe tötete nicht nur die Siedler, sondern machte auch die Welt über Jahrhunderte weg unbewohnbar. Die Krater vom Aufprall der Station sind aus dem Orbit noch immer zu sehen. Sottos Gruft ist zu einem Grab für den gesamten Planeten geworden.

languages.text: Cependant, il y a environ quatre cents ans de cela, un corps céleste non identifié a percuté la station de plein fouet, la projetant à toute vitesse contre la planète. Non seulement la catastrophe a tué les colons, mais elle a aussi rendu ce monde inhabitable des siècles durant. Le cratère formé par l'impact de la station est encore visible à ce jour depuis l'orbite. C'est ainsi que la tombe de Sotto s'est transformée en immense sépulcre pour la planète tout entière.
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.

traits.locale_text: Cependant, il y a environ quatre cents ans de cela, un corps céleste non identifié a percuté la station de plein fouet, la projetant à toute vitesse contre la planète. Non seulement la catastrophe a tué les colons, mais elle a aussi rendu ce monde inhabitable des siècles durant. Le cratère formé par l'impact de la station est encore visible à ce jour depuis l'orbite. C'est ainsi que la tombe de Sotto s'est transformée en immense sépulcre pour la planète tout entière.

languages.text: Yaklaşık dört yüz yıl önce ise tanımlanamayan bir gök cismi, istasyona temas edip yüksek bir hızla gezegene çarpmasına sebep oldu. Bu felaket yalnızca yerleşimcileri öldürmekle kalmadı, aynı zamanda dünyayı yüzyıllar boyunca yaşamdan yoksun kalacak bir yere dönüştürdü. Çarpma sonucu oluşan krater, bugün bile yörüngeden görülebilir. Sotto'nun Kabri, tüm gezegenin kabrine dönüştü.
languages.original_text: However, about four hundred years ago, an unknown cosmic body rammed into the station, causing it to collapse onto the planet. Not only did the catastrophe kill the settlers, it also made the world uninhabitable for centuries. The crater formed by the station's impact can still be observed from orbit. Sotto's Tomb became a sepulchre for the entire planet.
